oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Egypt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Arrowsmith, John, 1790-1873
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: London : John Arrowsmith, No 10 Soho Square
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 map : hand color ; 24 x 20 cm on sheet (27.5 x 21.5)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shows roads, trails, temples, archaeological sites, castles, villages. Publication date from the library's acquisition form.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Egypt -- Maps; Nile River Valley -- Maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
